T02D3615:238b-1: dzam bha la s'a dha nam /
T02D3615:239a-0: @239a * // dzam bha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3615:239a-1: stong pa nyid bsgoms pa'i rjes la /
T02D3615:239a-2: nyi ma la dzam yig las skyes pa'i dzam bha
T02D3615:239a-3: la ser po zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa mi
T02D3615:239a-4: bskyod pas ral pa'i cod pan can /
T02D3615:239a-5: phyag g-yas pa gsum na ma tu lung ga dag dang lcags kyu dang mda' bsnams pa ;
T02D3615:239a-6: g-yon gyi phyag dang pos rtsibs logs g-yon du gnas pa'i shes rab ma la 'khyud pa /
T02D3615:239a-7: gzhan dag gis zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sre mong dang /
T02D3615:239a-8: gzhu bkang ba'i bdag nyid du bskyed nas /
T02D3615:239a-9: mdun du de'i sku bsams shing lhag par gnas nas
T02D3615:239a-10: de'i spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bsgoms
T02D3615:239a-11: la / de la rab tu bcug cing dbang bskur nas /
T02D3615:239a-12: rdo rje'i chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad blud par bya'o //
T02D3615:239a-13: aom dzam bha la dza lendra ye sv'a h'a /
